Package org.sakaiproject.email.api

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CharacterSet
    Constants for common character encodings.
    ContentType
    Common content types (primary/subtype) sent with message for use by client handling.
    Digest
    Digest stores sets of messages for a given user (id).
    DigestEdit
    DigestEdit is a mutable Digest.
    DigestMessage
    DigestMessage is one message in a digest
    DigestService
    The DigestService collects sets of messages for different users, and sends them out periodically.
    EmailHeaders
    Common email header constants.
    EmailService
    EmailService is an interface to sending emails.
    MultipartType  
    PlainTextFormat
    Format types of text when using a content-type of text.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Attachment
    Holds an attachment for an email message.
    EmailAddress
    Value object for email address properties.
    EmailMessage
    Value object for sending emails.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    EmailAddress.RecipientType
    Type safe constant for recipient types
    RecipientType
    Type safe constant for recipient types
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AddressValidationException  
    NoRecipientsException
